website_summaries.verdict: While not designed for helium balloons, the LotFancy will make short work of inflating multiple latex or mylar balloons for parties.
pros: Includes nozzles for dual balloon inflation and different balloon sizes
Very powerful motor, fast inflation speed
cons: Motor is loud during operation, can overheat quickly

customer_reviews.title: This device is easy to use and loads of fun for children with adults. Key thing is WITH adults
customer_reviews.text: This device is so fun and easy to use, even children around 9 or so are capable of operating it. We were able to knock out about a hundred balloons as well as attach them to 4 stands in less than 2 hours. The children had a great time with the adults during this activity. We will be using this device regularly at our church.
customer_reviews.author: Texacali

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with this investment
customer_reviews.text: A family member and a friend built a balloon arch for a party using this pump. They inflated about 200 balloons in about 90 minutes. That arch could not have happened without this gizmo. The extended family has lots of little kids, so we anticipate using this balloon pump a lot. We are very happy with this investment.
customer_reviews.author: K. Faaborg

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be even more user-friendly than the directions would imply.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t inflated but Adaline‘s with it so far, but, this thing works awesome and I can’t wait to use it this weekend! It arrived in a timely manner. Takes a second for you to adjust to using it because it is sensitive, but all you do is put the balloon on it and push down and it fits the air in it you don’t have to push any gadgets turn it on or anything like that. It seems very user-friendly. We shall see!
customer_reviews.author: RegularAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after the third use.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well the first couple of times that I used it... I have Not used it to blow up that many balloons. So it’s hard to understand why when I tried to use it a couple days ago the one part/intermittent pump stop working for me in the middle of my event. Perhaps I received a defective pump... But I thought the value for the pump was really great initially. It would be great if the pump actually worked.
customer_reviews.author: EPC

customer_reviews.title: Makes quick work of 10" balloons and is really pretty quite. Great value
customer_reviews.text: Really works well! It's been working hard for several months now. Had tried various pumps without success. This one is the ticket. It inflates around 350 balloons a week and has been doing so for several months now. Makes quick work of 10" balloons and is really pretty quite. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Merlin

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud
customer_reviews.text: As some of the other users mentioned, this air pump is very loud (you'll need an ear plug) and heats up fast. It should say adults use only imo. It does function as described - Good for blowing balloons but I wouldn't let kids use it.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Jude

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Both nozzles don’t press down for air so you have to use both or just the one that does push down and does a great job blowing up 5” balloons! FINALLY! Two different air discharge options as well!
customer_reviews.author: Genese

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Reliable. Efficient little pump
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. I’ve used as a back up for pumping up my balloons for decorating events and I’m very happy with this little guy. Now I don’t use it often or much when I use it. I blow up my 3 foot latex balloons and it’s perfect! Quick easy no problem. Very happy great value
customer_reviews.author: Faerie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and easy to blow up balloons fast. I took it to work as we are always having to blow up balloons and we were using the hand pump. This is much faster.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Much better than blowing them up the old fashioned way hint ...
customer_reviews.text: 100's of balloons inflated in very little time. Much better than blowing them up the old fashioned way hint hint. if your buying this also get yourself some balloon clips so you don't have to tie them shut
customer_reviews.author: Happy mommy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted 250 balloons for her milestone birthday party! I didn't think I'd ever accomplish it. But, with this gizmo, it was so fast that we were done in less than hour. Balloons galore!
customer_reviews.author: kastenca

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could make balloon arches for my son’s graduation party and I love it , it saves me so much time. I used to use a helium tank to blow the balloons up, I had no idea this existed until I saw a How To Video on YouTube
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I made a great decision
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I purchased this little gadget, it has made my life so much easier with blowing my balloons up. It take less than 30 minutes for mr to blow up 72 balloons , verses a hour and a half using a hand pump
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I use these to make balloon arches and its great. No issues and very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia N.

customer_reviews.title: This was amazing! I was able to blow up over a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing! I was able to blow up over a 120 balloons with no problems. It is wonderful if you want to make duplets to cluster balloons, but it is a little more challenging if you need to tie each balloon individually. I recommend getting a friend to help. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Machine
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered it for my daughter's party but since it has not happened yet I took it to work because at work I create balloon columns and I had an order that needed to be completed before I left that day. It worked so nice, fast, and the sound was so low I was so happy! It took a few seconds to learn how to use. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nerissa Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Quit working properly during it's first time being used!!
customer_reviews.text: I just missed the window of returning this product, by one day!! It closed yesterday!! Did not know I only had a month to return it! Now I have Balloon pump that I've only used 1 time and it came with 2 airways but ONLY ONE WORKS!! I WILL NOT BUY this product again!

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought several of these for my business. Works great.

customer_reviews.title: Loud, piercing noise but blows up the balloons
customer_reviews.text: Blows up balloons but makes a high pitched piercing sound that is very annoying. If you have a few balloons it's doable, but if you have a hundred it is impossible to use it without affecting your hearing.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: The best Valentines Dance ever
customer_reviews.text: The air balloon machine was fabulous. The shipping and arrival was very quick, machine work flawlessly for an extended period of time. I had 6 college students working on it full time for about 15 minutes and was able to inflate hundreds and hundreds of air balloons for Valentines dance. We had hundreds of blooms all over the dance floor and they help to create a great atmosphere and end ambience of excitement and entertainment all during the dance. This was a great investment, a great tool to help us with a very successful Valentines dance.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Don't let negative reviews discourage you from buying. I bought two they work great. Like any electronic there is always going to be some that have defects. I was able to inflate 15 bags of 20 balloons in less than 30 minutes. Great buy for the money.

product_meta.title: LotFancy 680W Balloon Pump Electric, 110V-120V High Power Balloon Inflator Pump for Party Decoration, Portable, Dual Nozzle Air Balloon Filler Machine, Fast & Efficient
feature_bullets: 【HIGH POWER】 AC Power: 680W; The inflation rate is fast to 520 liters per minute; Electric current: 2A; Input voltage: 110V-120V; Pressure: 20000Pa~24000 Pa; Weight: N/W 48/52oz; Cable length: 70in

【FAST and EFFICIENT】This electric balloon inflator offers TWO OPERATING MODES, manual and automatic modes, inflating latex balloon and decorative balloon; DOUBLE NOZZLE makes you pump 2 balloons at a time; TWO EXTENDED NOZZLES to fit different sized balloons
【SAFE and EASY TO USE】Simple and anti-slip design; CE GS Approved; balloon blower will auto-disconnect for safety when left unattended for a period of time; we offer one-year warranty

【COMPACT and PORTABLE】Balloon pump is convenient, lightweight, easy to carry; perfect for house decoration, birthday, party, activities, banquet, wedding, festival scene layout (more suitable for round balloons, may not pump punch balloons or number balloons)
【ADVANCED DESIGN】Wire can be stored in the built-in storage compartment; 680W balloon pump is more powerful and efficient

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars216 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
